title.en: Aspiration Addressed to the Gurus of the Ngor Tradition1

text.en: Kunga Zangpo, lauded in the Victor’s prophecy,2
text.en-trans: gyalwé lung gi rab ngak künga zang

text.en: Sempa Chenpo,3heart-son of the Victorious One,
Sönam Sengé,5crown adornment of all the learned,
Reverend Könchok Pal,6mighty lord of knowledge and love,

text.en-trans: jampé yang ngö ngorchen tamché khyen
nira bhogé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: May I master all the profound and vast instructions
text.en-trans: do ngak chi dang khyepar sakyapé

text.en: Of the sūtra and mantra in general and especially the Sakya’s
text.en-trans: tsema zhiden sung ngak dampé chü

text.en: Essential instructions with their fourfold criteria of validity9
text.en-trans: gyü kyi gyalpö shé ka dang chepé

text.en: And the commentarial exposition of the king of tantras.
text.en-trans: zabgyé dampa kün la wangjor shok

text.en: Bless me, I pray, so that I may remain inseparable
From you, reverend and noble gurus, immaculate in
Your lifestyle and maintenance of ethical discipline
text.en-trans: drimé jetsün lama khyé nam dang

text.en: And in your practice, conduct, and view of emptiness.
text.en-trans: yerwa mepar jin gyi lab tu sol
